title: Even Durex is cashing in on brand ambassador Ranveer Singh‚Äôs fashion faux pas | bollywood | Hindustan Times
text:
‚Äî Durex India (@DurexIndia) February 22, 2017 
‚Äú‚ÄòAlways exciting, always safe‚Äô #Durex #DoTheRex,‚Äù the condom brand captioned the photo. 
In the picture Ranveer is seen in the now infamous white, translucent onesie that he wore to Shahid Kapoor‚Äôs pre-birthday party on Sunday. 
The outfit got him a lot of attention on Twitter where trolls compared him to condoms, plastics bags, laminated things and even sperm. Here‚Äôre are a few examples of merciless trolling: I love that #RanveerSingh is finally part of the live action #SpaceGhost coast to coast remake üôè pic.twitter.com/P3MMpuBmsE ‚Äî Rohitav Sharma (@rohitavsharma) February 20, 2017 Assassin's Creed : The Indian journey #RanveerSingh pic.twitter.com/6p5Eo8nq07 ‚Äî Alvin McStill (@freetimetweets) February 20, 2017 Someone please tell #RanveerSingh to stop following Lady Gaga. ‚Äî Corn Flakes (@ankittalukdar) February 20, 2017 Mom- Apne aap ko aache se cover karna bahar thand bahut hai .Ranveer singh- * Takes table cloth * okay mom pic.twitter.com/ks6wtgGitA
